mapper.select: SELECT A.plan_master_id AS planMasterId, A.title, A.created_at AS createdAt , C.city_pic, C.color, C.city_kor_name AS cityName, C.city_id , COUNT(D.user_id) AS likeCnt FROM feed A INNER JOIN plan_master B ON A.plan_master_id = B.plan_master_id INNER JOIN city C ON B.city_id = C.city_id LEFT JOIN feed_like D ON A.plan_master_id = D.plan_master_id GROUP BY A.plan_master_id ORDER BY COUNT(D.user_id) DESC LIMIT 8

SELECT A.plan_master_id AS planMasterId, A.title, A.created_at AS createdAt , C.city_pic, C.color, C.city_kor_name AS cityName , COUNT(D.user_id) AS likeCnt, C.city_id FROM feed A LEFT JOIN plan_master B ON A.plan_master_id = B.plan_master_id LEFT JOIN city C ON B.city_id = C.city_id LEFT JOIN feed_like D ON A.plan_master_id = D.plan_master_id GROUP BY A.plan_master_id ORDER BY COUNT(D.user_id) DESC

choose.when: SELECT A.title, A.content, B.start_date AS startDate, B.end_date AS endDate, B.people_cnt AS peopleCnt , C.color, C.city_kor_name AS cityName, C.city_id, B.user_id , IF(D.plan_master_id IS NULL, 0, 1) AS isLike FROM feed A INNER JOIN plan_master B ON A.plan_master_id = B.plan_master_id INNER JOIN city C ON B.city_id = C.city_id LEFT JOIN feed_like D ON D.plan_master_id = A.plan_master_id AND D.user_id = #{userId} WHERE B.plan_master_id = #{planMasterId}
choose.otherwise: SELECT A.title, A.content, B.start_date AS startDate, B.end_date AS endDate, B.people_cnt AS peopleCnt , C.color, C.city_kor_name AS cityName, C.city_id, B.user_id , IF(D.plan_master_id = -1, 1, 2) AS isLike FROM feed A INNER JOIN plan_master B ON A.plan_master_id = B.plan_master_id INNER JOIN city C ON B.city_id = C.city_id LEFT JOIN feed_like D ON D.plan_master_id = A.plan_master_id WHERE B.plan_master_id = #{planMasterId} LIMIT 1

mapper.select: SELECT D.place_id AS placeId, D.price, D.memo, D.start_time AS startTime , D.end_time AS endTime, D.`date` FROM feed A INNER JOIN plan_master B ON A.plan_master_id = B.plan_master_id INNER JOIN plan_detail D ON B.plan_master_id = D.plan_master_id WHERE B.plan_master_id = #{planMasterId}
